sourceDesc.p: Source is a handwritten draft (pencil on college‐ruled notebook paper).

editorialDecl.p: Quotes are marked up using TEI; no attempt to mark up names or titles of works has been made, as they received no special treatment in the source.
Mistakes are preserved as written. Additions are noted with the add element and strikeouts with del.
The page has a header of B@N: In the Palm of My Hand; this is not transcribed.

revisionDesc.change: Initial version, based on original handwritten source.

item.del: R&E Electronics buys out all power plants.

list.item: IUStarts chip project, changes name to Rylielectronics
Ajusts power lines to only give power to Rylielectronics; would take other products and make them compatible. (Also added chip!)

item.del: I.U. (International Union) gets suspicious, send me in

list.item: I am captured, chip installed, think it should overload m brain.

item.del: Doesn’t (I don’t just get the electronic’s memory, I also get their processors and memoryRAM)

list.item: chip (& me) sustained for gov. purposes

list.head: Sequels:
list.label: Download Complete
list.item: story of how Tyler is killed, and why his mind still lives.
list.label: We will be Invincible
list.item: The 3rd World War is coming, and only Tyler can stop it.
list.label: The aftermath of WWIII
list.item: Now Tyler’s exestince is no longer secret, and not everybody wants him to existBook 1 written
list.label: Breaking the Code
list.item: the technicians want Tyler dead, and try to break the code of his existence.

item.del: The Sun is going to blow, threatening the survival of the human race
Humans move to a new planet, name it Earth after their original planet. It is in the land of Africa. Ice Age and humans are forced to take a step back in evolution if they are to survive.
